Package views.continentView

Class EditContinentValuePanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • views.continentView.EditContinentValuePanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.Observer, javax.accessibility.Accessible
    public class EditContinentValuePanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements java.util.Observer
    This view panel is used to show the edit functionality for the existing continent.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
